1.title: Taxicab Confessions
1.plot: The crew arrives at their beautiful new vacation house in Savannah, Georgia. Lauren and Tiffany struggle to keep an explosive secret from Lyle, while Murray and Hannah must console Mattie... after Daddy calls her Martha.

4.title: Southern Discomfort
4.plot: The house is divided when a secret comes out about Lyle's fiancÃ© that Tiffany and Lauren have major issues with. Lyle is then forced to make a decision that could change his life forever. Mattie meets a guy who could the be the one she's looking for.

6.title: True Lies
6.plot: Lyle gets a shocking text from Santana. The gang goes ghost hunting and may bring home more than they bargained for. Mattie has to choose between her room mates and her family back home.

11.title: Last Call
11.plot: The cast says goodbye to Savannah and to each other for the last time. Old wounds open up between Tiffany and Bubba. Santana attempts to win back Lyle. The crew buries a time capsule in the backyard.

1.title: Go Hard or Go Home
1.plot: South Carolina will never be the same when eight of the biggest, baddest personalities in the south come together in one house to work hard and party even harder for one wild summer.

2.title: What's Your Name Again
2.plot: After the chaos of the first night in the house, everyone struggles to piece together what happened and get to know each other.

3.title: Love Triangles and Tribulations
3.plot: The gang meets Lucas, a hard-partying local who invites them to his river house for a mud-slinging day of four-wheeling and redneck sledding.

4.title: It's My Birrrday
4.plot: Following a wild bar fight near the marina, the gang is worried they might get fired. The next day, it's Lyle's birthday and his roommates surprise him with a boat, a keg and a beach party he'll never forget.

5.title: That Wasn't Whiskey
5.plot: Lyle begins to develop feelings for Mattie, and the pressure of juggling two women in the house drives him to have a serious talk with Lauren. Ryan makes a mortifying mistake after taking a swig out of a stray whiskey bottle.

6.title: Mattie Martha Meltdown
6.plot: After Mattie turns into her alter-ego, Martha, her argument with Tiffany turns physical. To relieve the tension in the house, the gang heads out to the country and makes dry ice bombs to blow things up.

8.title: Cuddling Days Are Over
8.plot: When Mattie discovers that Lyle's been twisting the truth about their relationship, she confronts him head on. Tiffany finally brings a man home, but keeping him there is a lot harder than she expected. To release some tension in the house, everyone heads to Myrtle Beach Speedway to race school buses in an old school battle of the sexes.

9.title: Rednecks in Heat
9.plot: Sexual frustration in the house is at an all time high as Tiffany makes a move on a roommate, Ryan and Lyle find love in the same bed and Walt makes a deep connection behind a bathroom door. At a big bonfire party, the gang says goodbye to the river house and everyone says hello to "Martha," as Mattie makes a scene and loses it on Lauren.

10.title: Payback's a Fish
10.plot: Walt and the girls face off in a stanky prank war. Mattie gets a letter from a guy that leaves her in tears. And it's an emotional goodbye as the gang packs up and parts ways, but not before Lyle flips his switch and goes face to face with Walt in the scariest standoff of the summer.

11.title: Party Down South: The After Party - Part 1
11.plot: Host Christine Lakin joins the entire cast as they look back at the craziest, most shocking events of the summer. Highlights from the first hour of this two-part reunion include a juicy never-before-seen fight, surprising insight into the Lauren-Lyle-Mattie love triangle, and the chance for a first-time roommate hookup, live on stage!

12.title: Party Down South: The After Party - Part 2
12.plot: The fun continues in hour two of the reunion, as host Christine Lakin shares more of the summer's wildest moments and never-before-seen footage with the entire cast. The girls hash it out over Lauren's lasagna, the dirty details of Lyle and Mattie's relationship are finally exposed, and the entire cast suffers the scrapes, bumps and bruises that are the unavoidable result of partying hard... Down South style.

1.title: Hot Mess Express
1.plot: This season the cast packs their bags to raise some hell in one of the wildest party towns in the south, Athens, Ga. Taylor brings her bible, as well as news of a new boyfriend to the house. As the booze starts flowing, so does Daddy's frustrations over Taylor's new relationship. Emotions run high, and the clothes come off, leaving the roommates with their wildest night yet.

2.title: Fight or We Gonna Kiss?
2.plot: Settling into their new digs in Athens, Georgia proves to be no easy feat for the gang. Wild Lyle makes an early appearance, and takes a beating for it from one his roommates. The guys mess around with Daddy, but take it too far and push him to his limit. And Daddy's further erratic behavior is starting to convince everybody else in the house that there might be something brewing between him and one of the roomies.

3.title: Lil Bit of a Problem
3.plot: The gang starts their new job and gets wild in downtown Athens while checking out the local party scene. Daddy struggles to hide his secret about Lil' Bit, and when she gushes about her boyfriend, he finally explodes. While the house takes the brunt of the damage, his friendship with Lil' Bit may never be the same again.

4.title: Stop Stalking
4.plot: Everybody seems ready to move on from the aftermath of last night's fight between Daddy and Lil' Bit, but as more details start trickling out, the ongoing drama threatens to destroy several more friendships. Out on the town, Walt meets a special little lady, but Lyle goes home empty handed, leading to a scuffle with a roommate who refuses to back down.

5.title: Get Over Me
5.plot: Now that the truth about Daddy and Lil' Bit has come out, she's dead set on going home. The rest of the roomies hope a four-wheeling trip and a wild night on the town could be enough to keep the house together. Daddy's hot friends arrive to kick the party up a notch and light a fire under the girls in the house.

6.title: Love is Blind and Drunk
6.plot: Daddy's friends arrive to cheer him up. Tiffany distances herself from Hunter, and finds comfort in the arms of another. Murray gets lucky in a bathroom and Lil Bit reaches her limit.

7.title: Banged Your Girl
7.plot: Lil Bit's boyfriend, Grant, comes to town and meets the family. Daddy promises to be nice, but all the roommates beg to differ. Tiffany calls Hunter to straighten out their rocky relationship. The gang goes out to Boarshead for an epic Dollar Drink Night.

8.title: Hurricane Martha
8.plot: Hurricane Martha hits Athens when Mattie's partying ways start to effect the whole house--and one roommate in particular. Lyle decides he needs to step up his marlin hunting game with some help from Ryan. After a wild night out, Tiffany has a breakthrough.

9.title: I'm a Baboso Baby!
9.plot: The roommates head to Cabo for a Party Down South of the Border. And it's nothing but fun - beaches, booze and booty-shaking contests - until they realize they're being stalked by a crazy senorita... Martha!

10.title: Livin La Vida Martha
10.plot: The roommates continue to Party Down South of the border, but it looks like Martha may be joining them in Cabo! Will Tiffany's efforts to surprise Lil' Bit with an amazing birthday be ruined by a jealous Mattie?

11.title: What Happens in Cabo...
11.plot: The roommates end their time in Cabo with a bang and head back to Athens - but not without a casualty along the way. Back at home, the party doesn't stop and Lil Bit finds herself struggling with her feelings.

12.title: The Truth Comes Out
12.plot: Lil' Bit and Daddy continue flirting and getting closer, but it's not sitting well with the rest of the house. Martha becomes Murray's wingman. Tiffany confronts Lil Bit about messing with Daddy's feelings, and Taylor finally comes to terms with how she's been acting.

13.title: Out with a Bang
13.plot: It's the last days of vacation and it's crazy as ever in Athens, Georgia. Martha tries to ruin Mattie's birthday and Lyle gets in a fight with a wall... and loses. But that ain't nothin' compared to who ends up in Daddy's bed.

14.title: Party Down South: The After Party
14.plot: The cast gives the inside scoop on their vacation in Biloxi together, including Ryan and Hannah's relationship, Murray and Walt teasing Lauren, and Lyle almost fighting Walt. On stage Tiffany argues with Hannah, Mattie gets emotional, and Walt impersonates Daddy's dance moves.

15.title: Drunksgiving
15.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Back in the Saddle
1.plot: As the roommates arrive in Biloxi, Mississippi for another wild vacation, they quickly realize they're a Lil' Bit short of eight people. But the party must go on, especially for Daddy, who pursues not one, but two of his roommates.

2.title: Battle of the Buns
2.plot: Walt and Daddy continue their competition to see who can get to Hott Dogg's buns first. After a surprise marriage proposal goes off the rails, two roommates shock the house when they end up in bed together.

3.title: 29 Going on Thirsty
3.plot: Things get crazy on Boudreaux's Birthday... Lyle makes out with a lobster, his cake crash lands in the pool, and Hott Dogg wakes up in someone else's bed.

4.title: Spilling, Spelling, and Spaghetti
4.plot: Tiffany and Lauren explode on Hannah after she douses them with soda. Daddy comes to her rescue and gets her out of the line of fire. To make amends, Hannah cooks her signature spaghetti for family dinner. Afterwards, hanging out by the fire pit, Daddy and Tiffany get into the biggest fight they've ever had.

5.title: Gettin' on and Goin' Off
5.plot: Daddy goes mano-a-mano with the entire house. Tiffany, Lauren and Hannah have a bonding day at a nail salon. While back at home, Terror Twins Walt and Murray fire the first shots in a prank war against Hott Dogg. After a crazy club night, Lyle and Mattie find themselves stumbling into familiar territory...

6.title: Between a Hott Dogg and a Hard Place
6.plot: Lyle and Mattie come to terms with their late-night make-out session. At a kooky country bar, Daddy makes a quick buck then struggles to get Hot Dog into bed. Lauren's friends make a visit, including one who has a history with Walt. Out at the club, Daddy takes a tumble, Murray pays Mattie's tab, and Martha comes out to party.

7.title: Some Type O'Way
7.plot: After surviving another round of Hurricane Martha, the roommates recognize that Hott Dogg might have feelings for Daddy. They hope to get through to him before it's too late.

8.title: Mixed Drinks and Mixed Signals
8.plot: Lyle pushes Walt to his boiling point, while Hott Dogg's feelings for Daddy boil over and emotions run high. To let off steam, the whole gang heads to Louisiana where a Martha storm starts brewing.

9.title: The Big Uneasy
9.plot: The gang heads to New Orleans where Mattie meets a new man, Daddy tries HARD to impress Hott Dogg, and Tiffany receives news that may end her vacation for good.

10.title: Down This Road Before
10.plot: A fight is sparked between housemates after Hannah confronts Daddy about what will become of their romance once the summer ends. And while the gang gets dirty at a massive mud fest, Daddy gets out of control and goes toe to toe with Murray.

11.title: Bye Bye, Biloxi!
11.plot: Mattie gets down n' dirty at a mudding bikini contest, Hannah faces off with Martha, and the gang blows it out on their final night as they say goodbye to Biloxi.

1.title: I'll Show You Crazy!
1.plot: This season the cast packs their bags for the Sunshine State, only to encounter some major shade. Hannah's new love interest divides the house. With tensions high, Tiffany & Hannah funnel their way into an explosive smackdown.

2.title: Blood, Sweat and Beers
2.plot: After a chaotic first night in the house, Tiffany must deal with the fallout from her fight with Hannah. Meanwhile, a back flip gone wrong lands Murray in the hospital, and an emotional Lyle is haunted by his past relationship.

3.title: Miss Martha's Wild Ride
3.plot: The gang barely survives a wild taxi ride with an angry Mattie, Lauren gets fed up with her shady boyfriend, and Walt & Murray's prank gets hairy.

4.title: It's Not a Dream, It's a Vision
4.plot: Daddy proves he has extra-sensory perception and predicts an exciting future for Walt. Lyle can't keep his mind off Santana and starts to think about taking their relationship to the next level.

5.title: Sagin' Cajuns
5.plot: Hurricane Martha lands on the party house and boys do their best not to let it ruin their night. The next day Mattie calls a family meeting to apologize and the housemates start airing out all their issues.

6.title: Party Down, South Beach
6.plot: Now that the sage smoke has finally cleared the air in the house, the roommates hope that Tiffany & Lauren's boyfriends won't bring new drama when they come to visit. Later, the gang decides to take a road trip to South Beach.

7.title: Gone Girl
7.plot: The trip to Miami gets off to a great start until the sun goes down and shots get poured. When Mattie goes missing, Don "Daddy" Johnson is on the case. Back at the house, Lyle makes a life-changing decision.

8.title: The Bou to My Dreaux
8.plot: Lyle's girlfriend, Santana, comes to visit but little does she know her life is going to change forever. All of the roommates come together to plan the most perfect marriage proposal for Lyle. Everyone is excited and worried that maybe someone is going to spill the beans. Will Santana be surprised and say yes?

9.title: Happy Birthday, Martha!
9.plot: Lyle gets an answer for his proposal and the gang throws Mattie an 80s skating birthday party. Tiffany learns some troubling news about Hannah's boyfriend, Cody. Martha redecorates the boys' bedroom.

10.title: We Got It Goatin
10.plot: It's the last weekend in St. Pete and the roommates want to go out with a bang. Single Lauren hits the town, Murray catches a shark, Walt brings home an animal lover and Hannah confronts Cody about his infidelity. The gang reflects on their time together and says their goodbyes... for now.

11.title: St. Petersburg, FL - The After Party
11.plot: The cast gets together to rehash their latest vacation in St. Petersburg, Florida... the good, the bad, and the hurricanes. They revisit Tiffany and Hannah's rocky start, Lauren's relationship with her boyfriend Destin, and Walt and Murray's adventures with the ladies of St. Pete. On stage, Lyle's fiancé, Santana, talks about his surprise proposal and the Terror Twins learn that they aren't the only ones who can pull a prank.

-1.title: Wild Karynda
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.title: Party Down South
plot: Strangers come to live in the South and party it up like real country folk.
